p: The RAW264.7 cells (2 × 10 5 cells per well in a 24-well plate) supernatants were centrifuged at 10,000× g at 4 °C for 10 min to remove debris, and stored at 80 °C until analysis. IL-1β, IL-6, and TNF-α were quantified using ELISA kits (R&D, Minneapolis, MN, USA), according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
